block.p: Stefanie Trepper, the daughter of Harriet and Myron Trepper of New York, was married last evening to Matthew Todd Feldman, a son of Arlene and Harvey Feldman of Highland Mills, N.Y. Rabbi Burt Aaron Siegel performed the ceremony at the University Club in New York.

Mrs. Feldman, 27, teaches the third grade at the Columbia Grammar and Preparatory School in New York. She graduated from Colby College and received a master's degree in elementary education from the Bank Street College of Education.

Stefanie Trepper, the daughter of Harriet and Myron Trepper of New York, was married last evening to Matthew Todd Feldman, a son of Arlene and Harvey Feldman of Highland Mills, N.Y. Rabbi Burt Aaron Siegel performed the ceremony at the University Club in New York.

Mrs. Feldman, 27, teaches the third grade at the Columbia Grammar and Preparatory School in New York. She graduated from Colby College and received a master's degree in elementary education from the Bank Street College of Education.
Her father is a co-chairman of Willkie Farr & Gallagher, the New York law firm. Her mother is a volunteer at Learning Leader, a literacy program in the New York City public schools.

Mr. Feldman, also 27, is a candidate for an M.B.A. at New York University. He graduated from Duke University. His mother is the director of special education for the Valley Central School District in Montgomery, N.Y. His father is an optometrist in Monroe, N.Y.
